poetry:
ğŸ–¤ Mohabbat kar ke bewafa ban gaye,
Kya khabar thi ke dard ka sila ban gaye,
Aansuon ne likh diye afsane hamare,
Jo lafzon ke darmiyan khafa ban gaye.

ğŸ’” Kisi ne poocha tum kis baat pe rote ho,
Maine kaha mohabbat mein jo mila woh khota ho,
Waqt beeta yaadein reh gayi,
Bas isi liye hum tanha aur khamosh hote ho.

ğŸ¥€ Har ghadi teri yaadon ka asar rehta hai,
Dil udaas aur aankhon mein asar rehta hai,
Mausam se poochho mere gham ki kahani,
Barsaat mein bhi ek sukoon sa darr rehta hai.

ğŸ˜” Tere bina zindagi mein kya rakha hai,
Sannata aur tanhaayi ka gila rakha hai,
Main har muskurahat ke peechhe chhupa hoon,
Dard ka ek samundar chhupa rakha hai.

ğŸ’˜ Tu door sahi lekin dil ke paas rehta hai,
Teri yaadon ka har pal ehsaas rehta hai,
Kabhi socha na tha juda ho jaayenge,
Ab bas har waqt tu mere saath rehta hai.

ğŸ–¤ Mohabbat mein haar kar bhi jeet gaya hoon,
Tere intezaar mein zinda hoon, lekin marta gaya hoon,
Tu khush rahe bas dua yahi hai,
Apni to har dua mein bas tera naam aaya hoon.

ğŸ’” Tumhare jaane ke baad kuch is tarah badla hoon,
Na hans paata hoon na roya hoon,
Bas ek khaali khaali sa lamha hoon,
Jo har pal teri yaadon mein khoya hoon.

ğŸ¥€ Ishq kiya tha dil se,
To dil tootne ka gham bhi sehna padha,
Har muskurahat ke peechhe dard tha,
Lekin duniya ko hansna dikhana padha.

ğŸ˜¢ Na jane kis galti ki saza mil rahi hai,
Tere bina har khushi adhuri si lag rahi hai,
Khud se bhi ab rooth gaya hoon,
Zindagi ab bas kaagazon si lag rahi hai.

ğŸ–¤ Aankhon mein neend na dil ko qarar hai,
Har waqt bas tera intezaar hai,
Na tu mila, na koi wajah mili,
Bas mohabbat ka yeh asar bepanah hai.

ğŸ’˜ Har shaam udaasi ka paigham laati hai,
Tere bina zindagi ek kahani si lagti hai,
Jo mila woh yaadon ka dard tha,
Tu hi na samjha toh duniya kya samjhegi.

ğŸ’” Tera khayal hi mera sukoon ban gaya,
Main tanha tha tu dard ka junoon ban gaya,
Ab toh har pal teri yaadon mein guzar jaata hai,
Jab se tu gaya, har din udaas ban gaya.

ğŸ¥€ Kya kehna hai is dil ka haal,
Tere bina zindagi lagti hai sawaal,
Mohabbat mein toh sab kuch de diya,
Phir bhi khaali reh gaya dil ka jahan.

ğŸ–¤ Aansu chhupaye, dard jhela,
Har lamha tere liye jiya,
Tere bina bhi muskuraya,
Par tere jaane ka gham na bhula paya.

ğŸ’” Tum aaye zindagi mein phir khwab dikhaye,
Har pal tere saath bitaye,
Phir bin bataye tum chale gaye,
Aur hum sirf yaadein sambhalte rahe.

ğŸ˜¢ Aankhon se aansu behte rahe,
Lab khamosh, dil kehte rahe,
Har waqt tu hi tu yaad aaya,
Aur hum tujhe har pal mein dhoondte rahe.

ğŸ’˜ Teri baatein ab bhi yaad aati hain,
Tere saath bitaye lamhe rulati hain,
Tu tha toh sab kuch tha,
Ab toh bas yaadein hi sath chalti hain.

ğŸ–¤ Har waqt dil ko teri talash rehti hai,
Tere bina har khushi adhuri lagti hai,
Jise chaha woh mil na saka,
Yahi sabse badi majboori lagti hai.

ğŸ’” Ek pal mein sab kuch badal gaya,
Jo apna tha woh hi door ho gaya,
Dil ke har kone mein sirf tu tha,
Ab tu hi nahi aur dil khaali ho gaya.

ğŸ¥€ Har shab tera khwab dekhta hoon,
Phir usi mein jeeta aur marta hoon,
Mohabbat ab bhi waisi hi hai,
Bas tu nahi, yeh dil bas yeh maanta hoon.

ğŸ˜¢ Tum door ho toh kya,
Yaadein toh paas hain,
Tere bina bhi zindagi chal rahi hai,
Lekin woh baat nahi jo tere saath thi.

ğŸ’˜ Har dil ko kisi ki talash hoti hai,
Kisi ek ki zarurat hoti hai,
Jab tak naa ho mulaqat usse,
Zindagi mein kuch kami si mehsoos hoti hai.

ğŸ’” Mohabbat se juda hokar bhi,
Mohabbat hi reh gaye,
Tere naam se hi roshni thi,
Ab andhero mein reh gaye.

ğŸ–¤ Zakhm dete ho aur muskurane ko kehte ho,
Khud door ho kar paas aane ko kehte ho,
Mohabbat ki thi toh samjha bhi hota,
Na samjhe aur bewafa kehlane ko kehte ho.

ğŸ¥€ Har ghadi tu yaad aata hai,
Har khushi mein dard chhup jata hai,
Tere bina sab kuch adhoora sa hai,
Bas tu hi tu har jagah dikhta hai.

ğŸ˜” Tumhari khushi ke liye chhod diya khud ko,
Ab teri khushi mein bhi khushi nahi milti,
Main to har waqt tere liye jeeta raha,
Par ab zindagi mein tu dikhayi nahi deti.

ğŸ’˜ Har khushi teri yaadon mein simat gayi,
Tere jaane ke baad har muskaan chhup gayi,
Jo tha bas tera, ab yaadon mein hai,
Tere bina har lamha sirf gham ban gayi.

ğŸ–¤ Waqt guzarta gaya, dard badhta gaya,
Har pal tera intezaar karta gaya,
Mohabbat thi ya koi saza thi,
Dil har din rota gaya, chhup chhup ke jiya.

ğŸ’” Shayari likhta hoon ab tere liye,
Har lafz mein sirf tu hi tu hoti hai,
Tujhse juda hokar bhi tere saath hoon,
Bas yahi khayal meri zindagi hoti hai.

ğŸ¥€ Na kehna juda ho jaayein,
Na kehna hum bhool jaayein,
Mohabbat to zinda rahegi,
Chahe hum na rahein, yaadein to reh jaayein.
